sig_info: Whenever Doom Nullifies a Power Gain Buff he receives one for himself, granting 20% of his max Power over 3 seconds.
If the Opponent isn’t already Shocked whenever Doom Nullifies any Buff, they have a 29.61 to 80.39% chance to be inflicted with a Shock Debuff, dealing 32.1 direct energy damage over 6 seconds.
